title: [Large-scale] Online Intensive Course for Understanding Calculus Concepts Based on the Teaching Unit Model (TUM)

context.additional_context: A course where learners, consisting of pre-service and in-service teachers, systematically acquire calculus concepts primarily using smartphones. Conducted via an interactive platform (PIAC) utilizing learning objects (LU) based on the Teaching Unit Model (TUM)

learning_goals: Learners can explain basic concepts of differentiation and integration and apply them to real-world problems

Learners can calculate three types of differentiation (quotient, product, composite functions) and two types of integration (basic/substitution) with 80% accuracy using learning objects (LUs) based on the Teaching Unit Model (TUM)
Learners can improve conceptual understanding by 20% by conducting peer and self-assessments using interactive tools on the online platform (PIAC)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
